data.name: Bleed of Fear
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Bleed of Fear, a terrifying theme park filled with traps and horrors.

Immersive Experience


Experience the graphics of the future. Bleed Of Fear was built with the most advanced technologies available to produce amazingly realistic visuals and fully immersive audio.

Investigation


Use tools and your senses to deactivate the hidden dangers lurking inside the park's attractions.

Explore

Explore the park's diverse attractions that simulate different environments.

Survive


Monitor your health to avoid an early death by heart attack, insanity, or bleeding.
Use everything you find in the environment to mix and build the medicine and tools necessary for your survival.

data.short_description: Welcome to Bleed of Fear, a terrifying theme park filled with traps and horrors.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (newer than version 1909.1350) and Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4590
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Latest Graphics Drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 2070 equivalent or better

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This game can depict scenes of blood, gore, fear, terror, death, or violence in various ways.
